verses.verse: ( The Circumcision and Passover at Gilgal) וַיְהִ֣י <WH1961> way·hî Now כִשְׁמֹ֣עַ <WH8085> ḵiš·mō·a‘ heard כָּל־ <WH3605> kāl- when all מַלְכֵ֣י <WH4428> mal·ḵê kings הָאֱמֹרִ֡י <WH567> hā·’ĕ·mō·rî the Amorite אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> ’ă·šer בְּעֵ֨בֶר <WH5676> bə·‘ê·ḇer vvv הַיַּרְדֵּ֜ן <WH3383> hay·yar·dên the Jordan יָ֗מָּה <WH3220> yām·māh west of וְכָל־ <WH3605> wə·ḵāl and all מַלְכֵ֤י <WH4428> mal·ḵê kings הַֽכְּנַעֲנִי֙ <WH3669> hak·kə·na·‘ă·nî the Canaanite אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> ’ă·šer - עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- along הַיָּ֔ם <WH3220> hay·yām the coast ( That is, along the Mediterranean coast; literally along the sea) אֵ֠ת <WH853> ’êṯ - אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> ’ă·šer- how הוֹבִ֨ישׁ <WH3001> hō·w·ḇîš had dried up יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - מֵ֧י <WH4325> mê the waters הַיַּרְדֵּ֛ן <WH3383> hay·yar·dên of the Jordan מִפְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> mip·pə·nê before בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> ḇə·nê- the Israelites יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> yiś·rā·’êl ... עַד־ <WH5704> ‘aḏ- until עָבְרָנוּ <WH5674> ʿå̄·ḇə·rå̄·nū they had crossed over, ( Or until we had crossed over) וַיִּמַּ֣ס <WH4549> way·yim·mas melted לְבָבָ֗ם <WH3824> lə·ḇā·ḇām their hearts וְלֹא־ <WH3808> wə·lō- failed הָ֨יָה <WH1961> hā·yāh ... בָ֥ם Prep│3mp ( ḇām) עוֹד֙ 5750 Adv ( ‘ō·wḏ) - ר֔וּחַ 7307 N-cs ( rū·aḥ) and their spirits מִפְּנֵ֖י 6440 Prep-m│N-cpc ( mip·pə·nê) for fear of בְּנֵֽי־ 1121 N-mpc ( bə·nê-) the Israelites יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ס 3478 N-proper-ms ( yiś·rā·’êl) ....

בָּעֵ֣ת <WH6256> bā·‘êṯ time הַהִ֗יא <WH1931> ha·hî At that אָמַ֤ר <WH559> ’ā·mar said יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- to יְהוֹשֻׁ֔עַ <WH3091> yə·hō·wō·šu·a‘ Joshua, עֲשֵׂ֥ה <WH6213> ‘ă·śêh “ Make לְךָ֖ Prep│2ms ( lə·ḵā) חַֽרְב֣וֹת 2719 N-fpc ( ḥar·ḇō·wṯ) knives צֻרִ֑ים 6697 N-mp ( ṣu·rîm) flint וְשׁ֛וּב 7725 Conj-w│V-Qal-Imp-ms ( wə·šūḇ) once again מֹ֥ל 4135 V-Qal-Imp-ms ( mōl) and circumcise אֶת־ 853 DirObjM ( ’eṯ-) - בְּנֵֽי־ 1121 N-mpc ( bə·nê-) the sons יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל 3478 N-proper-ms ( yiś·rā·’êl) of Israel שֵׁנִֽית׃ 8145 Number-ofs ( šê·nîṯ) .... ”

וַיַּעַשׂ־ <WH6213> way·ya·‘aś- made ל֥וֹ Prep│3ms ( lōw) יְהוֹשֻׁ֖עַ 3091 N-proper-ms ( yə·hō·wō·šu·a‘) So Joshua חַֽרְב֣וֹת 2719 N-fpc ( ḥar·ḇō·wṯ) knives צֻרִ֑ים 6697 N-mp ( ṣu·rîm) flint וַיָּ֙מָל֙ 4135 Conj-w│V-Qal-ConsecImperf-3ms ( way·yā·māl) and circumcised אֶת־ 853 DirObjM ( ’eṯ-) - בְּנֵ֣י 1121 N-mpc ( bə·nê) the sons יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל 3478 N-proper-ms ( yiś·rā·’êl) of Israel אֶל־ 413 Prep ( ’el-) at גִּבְעַ֖ת 1389 N-fsc ( giḇ·‘aṯ) Gibeath-haaraloth הָעֲרָלֽוֹת׃ 6190 Art│N-fp ( hā·‘ă·rā·lō·wṯ) ....

וְזֶ֥ה <WH2088> wə·zeh Now this הַדָּבָ֖ר <WH1697> had·dā·ḇār is why אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> ’ă·šer- - מָ֣ל <WH4135> māl circumcised them: יְהוֹשֻׁ֑עַ <WH3091> yə·hō·wō·šu·a‘ Joshua כָּל־ <WH3605> kāl- All הָעָ֣ם <WH5971> hā·‘ām those הַיֹּצֵא֩ <WH3318> hay·yō·ṣê who came out מִמִּצְרַ֨יִם <WH4714> mim·miṣ·ra·yim of Egypt — הַזְּכָרִ֜ים <WH2145> haz·zə·ḵā·rîm - כֹּ֣ל׀ <WH3605> kōl all אַנְשֵׁ֣י <WH582> ’an·šê the men הַמִּלְחָמָ֗ה <WH4421> ham·mil·ḥā·māh of war — מֵ֤תוּ <WH4191> mê·ṯū had died בַמִּדְבָּר֙ <WH4057> ḇam·miḏ·bār in the wilderness בַּדֶּ֔רֶךְ <WH1870> bad·de·reḵ on the journey בְּצֵאתָ֖ם <WH3318> bə·ṣê·ṯām after they had left מִמִּצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> mim·miṣ·rā·yim Egypt.

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> kî- Though מֻלִ֣ים <WH4135> mu·lîm circumcised, הָי֔וּ <WH1961> hā·yū were כָּל־ <WH3605> kāl- all הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> hā·‘ām ... הַיֹּֽצְאִ֑ים <WH3318> hay·yō·ṣə·’îm who had come out וְכָל־ <WH3605> wə·ḵāl none הָ֠עָם <WH5971> hā·‘ām of those הַיִּלֹּדִ֨ים <WH3209> hay·yil·lō·ḏîm born בַּמִּדְבָּ֥ר <WH4057> bam·miḏ·bār in the wilderness בַּדֶּ֛רֶךְ <WH1870> bad·de·reḵ on the journey בְּצֵאתָ֥ם <WH3318> bə·ṣê·ṯām vvv מִמִּצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> mim·miṣ·ra·yim from Egypt לֹא־ <WH3808> lō- ... מָֽלוּ׃ <WH4135> mā·lū had been circumcised.

כִּ֣י׀ <WH3588> kî For אַרְבָּעִ֣ים <WH705> ’ar·bā·‘îm forty שָׁנָ֗ה <WH8141> šā·nāh years, הָלְכ֣וּ <WH1980> hā·lə·ḵū had wandered בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> ḇə·nê- the Israelites יִשְׂרָאֵל֮ <WH3478> yiś·rā·’êl ... בַּמִּדְבָּר֒ <WH4057> bam·miḏ·bār in the wilderness עַד־ <WH5704> ‘aḏ- until תֹּ֨ם <WH8552> tōm had died, כָּל־ <WH3605> kāl- all הַגּ֜וֹי <WH1471> hag·gō·w the nation’s אַנְשֵׁ֤י <WH582> ’an·šê men הַמִּלְחָמָה֙ <WH4421> ham·mil·ḥā·māh of war הַיֹּצְאִ֣ים <WH3318> hay·yō·ṣə·’îm who had come out מִמִּצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> mim·miṣ·ra·yim of Egypt אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> ’ă·šer since לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lō- they did not שָׁמְע֖וּ <WH8085> šā·mə·‘ū obey בְּק֣וֹל <WH6963> bə·qō·wl ... יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD. אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> ’ă·šer So נִשְׁבַּ֤ע <WH7650> niš·ba‘ vowed יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD לָהֶ֔ם Prep│3mp ( lā·hem) לְבִלְתִּ֞י 1115 Prep-l ( lə·ḇil·tî) never הַרְאוֹתָ֣ם 7200 V-Hifil-Inf│3mp ( har·’ō·w·ṯām) to let them see אֶת־ 853 DirObjM ( ’eṯ-) - הָאָ֗רֶץ 776 Art│N-fs ( hā·’ā·reṣ) the land אֲשֶׁר֩ 834 Pro-r ( ’ă·šer) - נִשְׁבַּ֨ע 7650 V-Nifal-Perf-3ms ( niš·ba‘) had sworn יְהוָ֤ה 3068 N-proper-ms ( Yah·weh) He לַֽאֲבוֹתָם֙ 1 Prep-l│N-mpc│3mp ( la·’ă·ḇō·w·ṯām) to their fathers לָ֣תֶת 5414 Prep-l│V-Qal-Inf ( lā·ṯeṯ) to give לָ֔נוּ Prep│1cp ( lā·nū) us, אֶ֛רֶץ 776 N-fs ( ’e·reṣ) a land זָבַ֥ת 2100 V-Qal-Prtcpl-fsc ( zā·ḇaṯ) flowing חָלָ֖ב 2461 N-ms ( ḥā·lāḇ) with milk וּדְבָֽשׁ׃ 1706 Conj-w│N-ms ( ū·ḏə·ḇāš) and honey.

וְאֶת־ <WH853> wə·’eṯ- And בְּנֵיהֶם֙ <WH1121> bə·nê·hem their sons הֵקִ֣ים <WH6965> hê·qîm raised up תַּחְתָּ֔ם <WH8478> taḥ·tām in their place, אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> ’ō·ṯām - מָ֣ל <WH4135> māl and these were the ones he circumcised. יְהוֹשֻׁ֑עַ <WH3091> yə·hō·wō·šu·a‘ Joshua כִּי־ <WH3588> kî- since עֲרֵלִ֣ים <WH6189> ‘ă·rê·lîm still uncircumcised, הָי֔וּ <WH1961> hā·yū [Until this time] they were כִּ֛י <WH3588> kî ... לֹא־ <WH3808> lō- they had not מָ֥לוּ <WH4135> mā·lū been circumcised אוֹתָ֖ם <WH853> ’ō·w·ṯām - בַּדָּֽרֶךְ׃ <WH1870> bad·dā·reḵ along the way.

וַיְהִ֛י <WH1961> way·hî And כַּאֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> ka·’ă·šer- after תַּ֥מּוּ <WH8552> tam·mū ... כָל־ <WH3605> ḵāl all הַגּ֖וֹי <WH1471> hag·gō·w the nation לְהִמּ֑וֹל <WH4135> lə·him·mō·wl had been circumcised, וַיֵּשְׁב֥וּ <WH3427> way·yê·šə·ḇū they stayed תַחְתָּ֛ם <WH8478> ṯaḥ·tām there בַּֽמַּחֲנֶ֖ה <WH4264> bam·ma·ḥă·neh in the camp עַ֥ד <WH5704> ‘aḏ until חֲיוֹתָֽם׃פ <WH2421> ḥă·yō·w·ṯām they were healed.

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> way·yō·mer said יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah·weh Then the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- to יְהוֹשֻׁ֔עַ <WH3091> yə·hō·wō·šu·a‘ Joshua, הַיּ֗וֹם <WH3117> hay·yō·wm “ Today גַּלּ֛וֹתִי <WH1556> gal·lō·w·ṯî I have rolled away אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - חֶרְפַּ֥ת <WH2781> ḥer·paṯ the reproach מִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> miṣ·ra·yim of Egypt מֵעֲלֵיכֶ֑ם <WH5921> mê·‘ă·lê·ḵem from you. ” וַיִּקְרָ֞א <WH7121> way·yiq·rā has been called שֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> šêm ... הַמָּק֤וֹם <WH4725> ham·mā·qō·wm place הַהוּא֙ <WH1931> ha·hū So that גִּלְגָּ֔ל <WH1537> gil·gāl Gilgal ( Gilgal sounds like the Hebrew for roll.) עַ֖ד <WH5704> ‘aḏ to הַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> hay·yō·wm day. הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> haz·zeh this

וַיַּחֲנ֥וּ <WH2583> way·ya·ḥă·nū were camped בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> ḇə·nê- while the Israelites יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> yiś·rā·’êl ... בַּגִּלְגָּ֑ל <WH1537> bag·gil·gāl at Gilgal וַיַּעֲשׂ֣וּ <WH6213> way·ya·‘ă·śū they kept אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - הַפֶּ֡סַח <WH6453> hap·pe·saḥ the Passover. בְּאַרְבָּעָה֩ <WH702> bə·’ar·bā·‘āh of the fourteenth עָשָׂ֨ר <WH6240> ‘ā·śār ... י֥וֹם <WH3117> yō·wm day לַחֹ֛דֶשׁ <WH2320> la·ḥō·ḏeš of the month, בָּעֶ֖רֶב <WH6153> bā·‘e·reḇ On the evening בְּעַֽרְב֥וֹת <WH6160> bə·‘ar·ḇō·wṯ on the plains יְרִיחֽוֹ׃ <WH3405> yə·rî·ḥōw of Jericho,

וַיֹּ֨אכְל֜וּ <WH398> way·yō·ḵə·lū they ate מֵעֲב֥וּר <WH5669> mê·‘ă·ḇūr from the produce הָאָ֛רֶץ <WH776> hā·’ā·reṣ of the land. מִמָּֽחֳרַ֥ת <WH4283> mim·mā·ḥo·raṯ The day after הַפֶּ֖סַח <WH6453> hap·pe·saḥ the Passover, מַצּ֣וֹת <WH4682> maṣ·ṣō·wṯ unleavened bread וְקָל֑וּי <WH7033> wə·qā·lui and roasted grain בְּעֶ֖צֶם <WH6106> bə·‘e·ṣem on that very הַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> hay·yō·wm day, הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> haz·zeh ...

וַיִּשְׁבֹּ֨ת <WH7673> way·yiš·bōṯ ceased. הַמָּ֜ן <WH4478> ham·mān the manna מִֽמָּחֳרָ֗ת <WH4283> mim·mā·ḥo·rāṯ And the day בְּאָכְלָם֙ <WH398> bə·’ā·ḵə·lām after they had eaten מֵעֲב֣וּר <WH5669> mê·‘ă·ḇūr from the produce הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> hā·’ā·reṣ of the land, וְלֹא־ <WH3808> wə·lō- no הָ֥יָה <WH1961> hā·yāh There was ע֛וֹד <WH5750> ‘ō·wḏ more לִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> liḇ·nê for the Israelites יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> yiś·rā·’êl ..., מָ֑ן <WH4478> mān manna וַיֹּאכְל֗וּ <WH398> way·yō·ḵə·lū they began to eat מִתְּבוּאַת֙ <WH8393> mit·tə·ḇū·’aṯ the crops אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> ’e·reṣ of the land כְּנַ֔עַן <WH3667> kə·na·‘an of Canaan. בַּשָּׁנָ֖ה <WH8141> baš·šā·nāh year הַהִֽיא׃ס <WH1931> ha·hî so that

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> way·hî was בִּֽהְי֣וֹת <WH1961> bih·yō·wṯ ... ( The Commander of the LORD’s Army) יְהוֹשֻׁעַ֮ <WH3091> yə·hō·wō·šu·a‘ Now when Joshua בִּירִיחוֹ֒ <WH3405> bî·rî·ḥōw near Jericho, וַיִּשָּׂ֤א <WH5375> way·yiś·śā he looked up עֵינָיו֙ <WH5869> ‘ê·nāw ... וַיַּ֔רְא <WH7200> way·yar and saw וְהִנֵּה־ <WH2009> wə·hin·nêh- ... אִישׁ֙ <WH376> ’îš a man עֹמֵ֣ד <WH5975> ‘ō·mêḏ standing לְנֶגְדּ֔וֹ <WH5048> lə·neḡ·dōw in front of him וְחַרְבּ֥וֹ <WH2719> wə·ḥar·bōw sword שְׁלוּפָ֖ה <WH8025> šə·lū·p̄āh with a drawn בְּיָד֑וֹ <WH3027> bə·yā·ḏōw in His hand. וַיֵּ֨לֶךְ <WH1980> way·yê·leḵ approached יְהוֹשֻׁ֤עַ <WH3091> yə·hō·wō·šu·a‘ Joshua אֵלָיו֙ <WH413> ’ê·lāw Him וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> way·yō·mer and asked ל֔וֹ Prep│3ms ( lōw) , הֲלָ֥נוּ Prep│1cp ( hă·lā·nū) for us אַתָּ֖ה 859 Pro-2ms ( ’at·tāh) “ Are You אִם־ 518 Conj ( ’im-) or לְצָרֵֽינוּ׃ 6862 Prep-l│N-mpc│1cp ( lə·ṣā·rê·nū) for our enemies? ”

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר׀ <WH559> way·yō·mer He replied. לֹ֗א <WH3808> lō “ Neither, ” כִּ֛י <WH3588> kî ... אֲנִ֥י <WH589> ’ă·nî “ I שַׂר־ <WH8269> śar- as Commander צְבָֽא־ <WH6635> ṣə·ḇā- army. ” יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah·weh of the LORD’s עַתָּ֣ה <WH6258> ‘at·tāh have now בָ֑אתִי <WH935> ḇā·ṯî come וַיִּפֹּל֩ <WH5307> way·yip·pōl fell יְהוֹשֻׁ֨עַ <WH3091> yə·hō·wō·šu·a‘ Then Joshua אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- facedown פָּנָ֥יו <WH6440> pā·nāw ... אַ֙רְצָה֙ <WH776> ’ar·ṣāh ... וַיִּשְׁתָּ֔חוּ <WH7812> way·yiš·tā·ḥū in reverence ( Or and paid homage or and worshiped) וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> way·yō·mer and asked ל֔וֹ Prep│3ms ( lōw) Him, מָ֥ה 4100 Interrog ( māh) “ What אֲדֹנִ֖י 113 N-msc│1cs ( ’ă·ḏō·nî) does my Lord מְדַבֵּ֥ר 1696 V-Piel-Prtcpl-ms ( mə·ḏab·bêr) have to say אֶל־ 413 Prep ( ’el-) to עַבְדּֽוֹ׃ 5650 N-msc│3ms ( ‘aḇ·dōw) His servant? ”
